distance

public double distance(Point pt)
distance from point this doesn't really measure distance..it just gives a sort of yes/no answer as to whether the point pt is close enough (within snap tolerance) to the curve representing the path todo: this doesn't work very well...seems to 'intersect' even when the cursor is pretty far away
Overrides:
distance in class QItem
Parameters:
pt - a coordinate
Returns:
the distance

isDeleteItem

public boolean isDeleteItem()
returns true iff item should be deleted in the process of deleting selected items from a quiver. Arrows should be deleted if they are selected, or if either endpoint is selected. This can be overridden by the CAN_DELETE attribute
Overrides:
isDeleteItem in class QItem
